Get to know EGLD

EGLD is the main token of MultiversX, formerly Elrond, which is built for fast transaction speeds and high scalability. Its architecture supports a high volume of transactions at a low cost, making it suitable for developers and businesses looking to implement scalable dApps. EGLD uses a secure proof-of-stake mechanism to maintain security and efficiency, and it plays a key role in network operations such as paying fees, staking, and governance.
